phrs.translation: 使失去方向感, 使迷惑, 使

sentences.sentence: Experts have also said that 3d footage can disorientate the brain, causing eye strain and headaches.
sentences.translation: 专家还称，3d的连续镜头会迷惑人们的大脑，引起眼疲劳和头痛。

sentences.sentence: Organisers of the annual initiative, now in its fifth year, say the bright lights disorientate the migrating birds and override their natural navigational cues.
sentences.translation: 组织者们自发一年一度的活动，到今年他们是第五次了。他们称，明亮的灯光会使候鸟们失去方向感，还会打乱他们的天然航行信号。
